CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, 'Plantyn'), ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, 'Liber'), AND(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, 'Noordhoff'), Account.isProfessional__c = false)),OR( InvoiceEmail__c = null , OrderNotificationEmail__c = null , BillingReminderEmail__c = null)),1, IF(AND((ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, 'Noordhoff Professional') || AND(ISPICKVAL(OperatingCompany__c, 'Noordhoff'), Account.isProfessional__c = true)), OR( InvoiceEmail__c = null , BillingReminderEmail__c = null)),1,0))
CustomField.label: Validate ActivateEmailsRequired
